title: 1996 Fenster Zum Hof (Window to the yard)

sources.title: 1996FensterZumHofHommageAnSiegfriedKrakauer.Mov24Min
sources.description: View from a balcony window with details from buildingparts in a rhythmic blending technology of a Canon Hi 8 camera. Tribute to Siegfried Kracauer. (Lutz Mommartz)
